driver

Class MongoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • driver.MongoManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DbFunctions, QueryEngine, QueryFunctions

    public class MongoManager
extends Object
    Generates cache of normalized server config files and data. Must have 'mongod' running simultaneously.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    ActianceEngInterns

      • generateFilter

        public static org.bson.Document generateFilter(String path)
        Private helper method. Given path inputs, verifies the validity of the inputs and generates filters for the inputs.
        example path parameters:
        dev1/fabric2
        example filter:
        {environment: "dev1", fabric: "fabric2"}
        Parameters:
        path - the path for which a filter is being generated
        Returns:
        the generated filter as a BSON Document

      • clearDB

        Clears all Documents from database.
        Returns:
        the number of properties cleared from the database
